wawuniyawa, settikulam sahana gammanaye pera pasal adhyapanaya labana daru dariyange awashyathawaya wenuwen poth pradanaya kirima uthuru palath aandukara mejar janaral ji. ee. chandrasiri mahathage pradhanathwayen eeye (8) sidu kerini.japana shri lanka sahayogitha sangamaya magin laba dun me poth thogaya ema sangamaye sabhapathi yoshiyaki katho mahatha athin baththaramulle pihiti uthuru palath aandukara upa karyalayedi mejar janaral ji. ee. chandrasiri mahatha wetha nila washayen bara dunneya.pera pasal adhyapanaya labana daru dariyanta itha pahasuwen danuma laba gatha haki paridi me poth nirmanaya kota thibena athara sinhala, damila ha ingrisi yana bhasha thrithwayenma eewa samanwitha we.settikulam sahana gammanaya thula pera pasal 25 ka pamana daru dariyo 2000 k pamana igenuma labana bawath me siyalu denagema prayojanayata gatha haki paridi jangama pusthakala 18 k aarambha karana bawath uthuru palath aandukarawaraya pawasiya.punakari, karachchi ha thunkkayi aadi pradeshawala pasal wiwrutha kota awashya pahasukam laba dimata rajaya piyawara gena athayi ki ji. ee. chandrasiri mahatha ‚Äúuthuru wasanthaya‚Äù yatathe daru dariyange adhyapana katayuthu naga situwima udesa wishala wadapiliwelak uthuru palath sabhawa magin kriyathmaka kara athayida kiweya.poth 25 bagin adangu kattala mehidi pradanaya karana lada athara eewaye watinakama rupiyal 280000 ki.samaja sewa ha samaja subasadhana amathyanshaye lekam wi.
